warned people it's
dangerous and to<NEXT>stay away, there's
always someone who
comes to gawk...[0x9b][0xa5][0x80]4[0x0][0x0][0x0]<DIALOG2>No matter what you

able to get to the<NEXT>entrance of those
ruins!<NEXT>I don't care how
high you can jump--
forget it![0x9b][0xa5][0x80]4[0x0][0x0][0x0]<DIALOG2>It'll take a lot of
work to get this<NEXT>put back the way
it was...<NEXT>Maybe we should
just leave it as it
is and make a<NEXT>tourist attraction
out of it...[0x9b][0xa5][0x80]4[0x0][0x0][0x0]<DIALOG2>If you were a bird,
you could just fly
right up there...[0x9b][0xa5][0x80]4[0x0][0x0][0x0]<DIALOG2>Whew...Climbing up
that took the wind
out of me!<NEXT>Maybe I should go
on a diet...[0x9b][0xa5][0x80]4[0x0][0x0][0x0]<DIALOG2>Forget about it--
this is a dead-end![0x9b][0xa5][0x80]4[0x0][0x0][0x0]<DIALOG2>Hey, would you do
me a favor? Could
you take a picture<NEXT>of me with the
entrance to the ruins
in the background?<NEXT>[0x88][0x6e][0x0][0xa0][0x0]81[0x8f][0x0]8[0x86][0x0][0x0][0x9c]6[0x0][0x92]1[0x0][0xe9]Yes [0x92]1[0x11][0xe9]No[0x86]1[0x0][0x93][0x80]AB[0xa5][0x80][0x0][0x0][0x0][0x0]<DIALOG2>Thanks....<NEXT>...<NEXT>Huh? Oh, no--I must

myself![0x9b][0xa5][0x80]4[0x0][0x0][0x0]<DIALOG2>This area is
strictly off-
limits!<NEXT>Well, that's what I
tell everyone, but<NEXT>they just ignore me
and go in anyway...
Go ahead...[0x9b][0xa5][0x80]4[0x0][0x0][0x0]<DIALOG2>You went inside
this Sub-Gate a<NEXT>while ago, didn't
you?<NEXT>A little while
after you went in,<NEXT>there was a big
tremor...<NEXT>I thought maybe the
cliff was going to<NEXT>collapse or
something![0x9b][0xa5][0x80]4[0x0][0x0][0x0]<DIALOG2>I saw your battle
up in the sky--<NEXT>it was really
something![0x9b][0xa5][0x80]4[0x0][0x0][0x0]<DIALOG2>Now how did I get
up here?<NEXT>I can't climb up,
and I'm afraid to
jump down...[0x9b][0xa5][0x80]4[0x0][0x0][0x0]<DIALOG2>I'm an editor for a
magazine...<NEXT>I'm thinking about
doing a special on<NEXT>"New Attractions on
Kattelox"...[0x9b][0xa5][0x80]4[0x0][0x0][0x0]<DIALOG2>A Sub-Gate
appearing out of
nowhere?<NEXT>No, nothing like
that's happened
here...[0x9b][0xa5][0x80]4[0x0][0x0][0x0]<DIALOG2>There've been a lot
of disasters lately,
so I'm really busy![0x9b][0xa5][0x80]4[0x0][0x0][0x0]<DIALOG2>I was wondering
where my wife had
gotten to, and then<NEXT>I found her here,
of all places!<NEXT>She just gives me
no end of worry...<NEXT>Now, how do you
figure we should
get down from here?[0x9b][0xa5][0x80]4[0x0][0x0][0x0]<DIALOG2>I'm so glad my
husband showed up
to help me!<NEXT>He always comes and
gets me when I'm
in trouble![0x9b][0xa5][0x80]4[0x0][0x0][0x0]<DIALOG2>I hear that some
new Sub-Gates
appeared...<NEXT>I'll have to use
them as the topic
for our next special![0x9b][0xa5][0x80]4[0x0][0x0][0x0]<DIALOG2>Yeah, I heard it
here, too--a really
loud noise!<NEXT>I was worried that
it was an earth-
quake or something,<NEXT>and I was going to
fall![0x9b][0xa5][0x80]4[0x0][0x0][0x0]<DIALOG2>I felt this really
strong rumbling
just now!<NEXT>I hope this place
doesn't collapse...<NEXT>Please, help us!
Make sure we don't
die![0x9b][0xa5][0x80]4[0x0][0x0][0x0]<DIALOG2>D-d-don't worry!
I'll take care
of you![0x9b][0xa5][0x80]4[0x0][0x0][0x0]<DIALOG2>Did you feel that
tremor?<NEXT>It's all over for
us, I just know
it...[0x9b][0xa5][0x80]4[0x0][0x0][0x0]<DIALOG2>I've got the title
of our next
special--<NEXT>'Is there a future
for Kattelox
Island?'[0x9b][0xa5][0x80]4[0x0][0x0][0x0][0x0][0x0][0x0][0x0][0xa3][0x0][0x0][0x0][0x0]1[0x0]2[0x80][0x87][0x5a][0x0][0xa3]1[0x0][0xff][0xff][0x0][0x0]2[0x0][0xa5][0x80][0x0][0x0][0x0][0x0]
